client.turntracker

Interface ITurnTrackerView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TurnTrackerView

    public interface ITurnTrackerView
extends IView
    Interface for the turn tracker view, which displays whose turn it is, and what state the game is in

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initializePlayer(int playerIndex, java.lang.String playerName, CatanColor playerColor)
      Initializes the properties for a player in the turn tracker display
      void setLocalPlayerColor(CatanColor value)
      Sets the color to display for the local player

      Updates the game state button's message and enable state

      Updates the properties for a player in the turn tracker display

        getController, setController

    • Method Detail

      • setLocalPlayerColor

        void setLocalPlayerColor(CatanColor value)
        Sets the color to display for the local player
        Parameters:
        value - The local player's color

      • initializePlayer

        void initializePlayer(int playerIndex,
                    java.lang.String playerName,
                    CatanColor playerColor)
        Initializes the properties for a player in the turn tracker display
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The player's index (0 - 3)
        playerName - The player's name
        playerColor - The player's color

      • updatePlayer

        void updatePlayer(int playerIndex,
                int points,
                boolean highlight,
                boolean largestArmy,
                boolean longestRoad)
        Updates the properties for a player in the turn tracker display
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The player's index (0-3)
        points - The number of victory points the player has
        highlight - Whether or not the player's display should be highlighted
        largestArmy - Whether or not the player has the largest army
        longestRoad - Whether or not the player has the longest road

      • updateGameState

        void updateGameState(java.lang.String stateMessage,
                   boolean enable)
        Updates the game state button's message and enable state
        Parameters:
        stateMessage - The new message to be displayed in the game state button
        enable - Whether or not the game state button should be enabled
